name: Frog
text: Oh hi.. Can you help me?

name: Frog
text: I just hate this trash.. You should clean it up!

name: You
text: Well, but why is it here?

name: Frog
text: These are people.. They pollute, burn and destroy our forest..

name: Wolf
text: Please help! The field is on fire!

name: Wolf
text: You should bring some water, do you have a bucket?
